Package interfaces.observer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AddReportService
    The AddReportService defines the type of ObservableService that provides user with the service, in particular makes the RemoteObserver add a new report
    DeleteReportService
    The AddReportService defines the type of ObservableService that provides user with the service, in particular makes the RemoteObserver delete a report
    ObservableService
    The ObservableService provides connected users with report updates, implementing an Observer pattern
    RemoteObserver
    The RemoteObserver provides Watchneighbours server with methods to send connected users, implementing an Observer pattern report updates
    UpdateReportService
    The AddReportService defines the type of ObservableService that provides user with the service, in particular makes the RemoteObserver update a report data
